p.span: 1: Shield Mastery - Shields you wear gain +1 damage and the Concussive property. Shields also lose the unwieldy property. In addition, you gain a list of augments that you can apply to the ability,

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: deal 3 less damage with all of their attacks. This augment can be applied multiple times.

p.span: cannot benefit from any bonuses gained from having nearby allies and cannot help make a target be flanked.

p.span: 2: Dauntless - You gain an extra 2 AP each turn that can only be spent on [Out-of-Turn] actions. In addition, you gain +2 titan soak. Soak from armor you wear is doubled.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
